mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar(calendarno, labeldate, label, title, content, cnt, seqno, regdate, memberno) VALUES(calendar_seq.nextval, #{labeldate}, #{label}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, 1, sysdate, #{memberno})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Calendar ORDER BY calendarno ASC
SELECT calendarno, labeldate, label, seqno FROM calendar WHERE SUBSTR(labeldate, 1, 7) = #{labeldate} ORDER BY labeldate ASC, seqno ASC
SELECT calendarno, labeldate, label, seqno FROM calendar WHERE labeldate = #{labeldate} ORDER BY seqno ASC
mapper.update: Update calendar Set seqno=seqno-1 Where calendarno=#{calendarno}
Update calendar Set seqno=seqno+1 Where calendarno=#{calendarno}
mapper.select: SELECT calendarno, labeldate, label, seqno, regdate FROM Calendar WHERE (#{calendarSearchLabel} IS NULL OR label LIKE '%' || #{calendarSearchLabel} || '%')

SELECT calendarno, labeldate, label, seqno, regdate, r FROM ( SELECT calendarno, labeldate, label, seqno, regdate, rownum AS r FROM ( SELECT calendarno, labeldate, label, seqno, regdate FROM calendar WHERE (#{searchLabel} IS NULL OR label LIKE '%' || #{searchLabel} || '%') ORDER BY labeldate DESC ) ) WHERE r >= #{start_num} AND r <= #{end_num}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM calendar WHERE (#{searchLabel} IS NULL OR label LIKE '%' || #{searchLabel} || '%')
